lines.text: The "freedom not to get involved." It's perhaps the most valued freedom we have in this country.
"There are few wars between good and evil; most are between one good and another good."
Admiral, is it true that everyone has a premonition about their own death?
Julian, how can you take the word of someone who hasn't died yet?
Alcohol is humanity's friend. Can I abandon a friend?
I'm not being arrogant. It's just that after being barked at by so many ill-bred dogs, every now and then I take a kick at one for the dog's own good.
is this what it's like to wield power? I'm surrounded by rascals trying to take advantage of me.
Nobody does anything until he gets an opportunity.
